start: ^Ah, just in time! I have a commission for a weapon like no other.
^But I need a rare metal, one that can only be found in the depths of an ancient dungeon.
^Dangerous place, but I trust you’re up for it?
^I can handle it. Where is it?
^"It’s in an old dungeon outside the city, hidden away for ages.
^Guarded by warriors who see anyone who enters as an intruder.
^You’ll need to deal with them to reach the metal.
goal_0: ^The dungeon you’re heading to is no joke.
^Gallic soldiers are stationed throughout, ready to fend off anyone they don’t recognize.
^Be prepared for a fight and stay sharp they’re skilled fighters.
^Thanks for the warning. I’ll keep my guard up.
goal_1: ^You’ve returned! And with the metal! Perfect.
^With this, I can forge something truly extraordinary.
^Here, take this as a token of gratitude a piece made from the finest materials. May it serve you well.
